name: The Void (itch) (TCD_95)
description:
I made this game for The RNJam. It was my first game and any constructive criticism or suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks for checking the project out and maybe even playing it! Please note I made this game in a very short amount of time (a couple of hours!).

Name generated by: https://89o.itch.io/rng

Future updates:

- Waves.

- Point System.

-More refined Death event.

- Music.
